import React, { Component } from "react"; import Trademark from "../Trademark"; import "./style.css"; import Carousel from "react-bootstrap/Carousel"; import ProductItem from "../Product/ProductItem.js"; import * as mobileApi from "../apis/mobile"; import _ from "lodash"; import * as trademarkApi from "../apis/trademark"; export default class index extends Component { state = { hang: "", data: [] }; renderList() { var result = null; result = this.state.data.map((value, key) => { return ; }); return result; } async componentDidMount() { let hang = this.props.match !== undefined && this.props.match.params.trademark; let data = null; await mobileApi .mobile() .then((success) => { data = success.data.value.$values; }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); let trademarkid = null; await trademarkApi.findTrademarkIdByName(hang).then((success) => { if (success.status === 200) trademarkid = success.data.value; }); _.remove(data, (n) => { return n.mathuonghieu !== trademarkid; }); this.setState({ data: data, hang: hang }); } render() { return (
